ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.PART1: Hi, Iâ€™m a german speaking Frontend Developer based near Munich. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
